Attributes.description: Practical tools for university-level writing in French. Apply stylistic devices and rhetorical structures to form questions and arguments, analyse literary and cultural objects, and produce a variety of essay genres.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of FREN 220, FREN 221, FREN 311.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: To, Room: Be
